text:
Henri Antoine Marie Teissier (21 July 1929 – 1 December 2020) was a French-Algerian Catholic prelate. He was the Bishop of Algiers and Archbishop Emeritus of Algiers from 1998 to 2008. He was born in Lyon, France.
Teissier died on 1 December 2020 at a hospital in Lyon from problems caused by multiple strokes at the age of 91.
